content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining System at Position(41.0, -85.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill mining coal
- Burner inserter at (42.5, -83.5) moving coal from drill to storage
- Wooden chest at (43.5, -83.5) storing coal

### Iron Production System 1 at Position(-20.0, -54.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill mining iron ore
- Stone furnace at (-19.0, -52.0) smelting iron plates

### Iron Production System 2 at Position(-14.0, -56.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill mining iron ore
- Stone furnace at (-13.0, -54.0) smelting iron plates

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Errors
- When placing transport belts, ensure the target location is clear and not on unplaceable terrain (like water)
- When placing inserters next to entities, ensure:
  - There is enough space between entities
  - The reference position and direction are compatible with existing structures
  - No other entities are blocking the placement position
  - The spacing parameter is appropriate for the setup

### Resource Management
- Ensure sufficient coal is available in inventory before attempting to insert it into entities
- Monitor fuel levels in burner devices to maintain continuous operation

### System Design Issues
- Iron production systems are showing "output blocked" warnings due to items on ground
- Consider implementing proper item transport between components to prevent blockages
- Ensure proper sink entities are in place to accept outputs from mining drills

NAMESPACE

Functions:
- place_entity(): Places entities at specific coordinates
- place_entity_next_to(): Places entities adjacent to existing ones with specified spacing and direction
- insert_item(): Transfers items from inventory to entities
- extract_item(): Removes items from entities to inventory

Important Variables:
- EntityStatus: Enum tracking entity operational states (WORKING, WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS, NO_INGREDIENTS)
- Direction: Enum for entity orientations (UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT)
- Position: Class representing x,y coordinates
- Inventory: Class managing item storage for entities
